result.name: Severe COVID-19 in the Basque Country, Spain: Risk Prediction Model with Genetic and Clinical Factors
result.description: Using massive sequencing tools, this project aims to identify common genetic variants associated with COVID-19 severity. Then, this genetic alongside some clinical characteristics, a machine learning model that predicts if a patient will have mild or severe COVID-19 symptoms has been developed.
result.center: IIS Biocruces Bizkaia ? Universidad del Pais Vasco (UPV/EHU)
